attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a parting gift, Mr Blair, change the rules to allow someone such as a serving member of our Forces for the last 11 years, the medical treatment he would be allowed if it wasn't for "NICE" not being prepared to accept the effectiveness of the drug in question.  If this same drug is acceptable in Cyprus & Germany, why can't we use it?  Or is it just cost?

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
